title: Microsoft 365 Copilot - Sign in
text: Welcome to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app Your everyday AI companion that understands your work, helps you stay focused, and moves you from idea to impact with less friction and more flow. Start a conversation with these prompts in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat* One place for your AI and productivity tools Explore how the Microsoft 365 Copilot app helps you search, chat*, create, and stay in the flow. Find what matters fast Find files and information with a streamlined search experience. Go to Search Chat with your AI assistant* Summarize, draft, analyze, and explore ideas with AI chat. Go to Chat Turn ideas into polished content Create images, posters, banners, videos, surveys and more with easy-to-use templates. Go to Create Access AI-powered apps Get AI assistance in your favorite apps like Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more. Go to Apps
